string-array.name: data_name
string-array.item: Logitech G Pro Wireless Gaming Mouse
Logitech G413 Mechanical Backlit Gaming Keyboard

string-array.name: data_description
string-array.item: Logitech G433 gaming headset is the premium audio experience designed for life in and out of the game. Patent-pending Pro-G audio drivers smoothly deliver explosive DTS Headphone: X 7.1 surround sound. Vibrant color choices in a lightweight, stain-resistant fabric make G433 as wearable as your sneakers.

The Logitech G Pro Mouse is a high-performance gaming mouse designed to meet the demands of professional esports athletes and serious gamers alike. With its cutting-edge technology and ergonomic design, it offers a seamless and precise gaming experience that can give you the competitive edge you need.

Logitech G102 Prodigy Gaming Mouse can be used directly out-of-the-box, or can be fully configured using Logitech Gaming Software. Advanced users can configure any of the 6 buttons to simplify in-game actions.

The Logitech G413 Mechanical Backlit Gaming Keyboard is engineered to outperform the competition, giving you the edge in games where every millisecond matters. Featuring Romer-G switches, used by eSports professionals worldwide, G413 provides unparalleled speed, responsiveness and durability.
Logitech G903 Lightspeed Wireless Gaming Mouse W/Hero 16K Sensor, 140+ Hour with Rechargeable Battery and Lightsync RGB. Powerplay Compatible, Ambidextrous, 107G+10G optional, 16, 000 DPI.

The Logitech F710 Wireless Gamepad is a wireless gamepad that lets you play your favorite games on your PC or Mac. It features a 2.4 GHz wireless connection, dual vibration feedback motors, and a 10-foot range.
The Logitech G29 Driving Force is a racing wheel that is designed to be used with the PlayStation 4, PlayStation 3 and PC. It features a 900-degree rotation, force feedback, and an LED display.

The Logitech G213 Prodigy Gaming Keyboard is a keyboard that is designed for gamers. It features a full-size layout, RGB lighting, and a detachable wrist rest. The keyboard is also spill-resistant, so you don\'t have to worry about spills ruining your keyboard.

The Logitech G840 Gaming Mousepad is a mousepad that is designed for gamers. It features a large surface area, a non-slip rubber base, and a smooth cloth surface. The mousepad is also water-resistant, so you don\'t have to worry about spills ruining your mousepad.

The Logitech C922 Pro Stream Webcam is a webcam that is designed for streamers. It features a Full HD 1080p resolution, a 78-degree field of view, and a built-in microphone. The webcam is also compatible with Windows, Mac, and Chrome OS.

The Logitech G560 Gaming Speaker is a speaker that is designed for gamers. It features a 2.1 speaker system, RGB lighting, and a built-in microphone. The speaker also compatible with Windows, Mac, and Chrome OS.
